summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2019, forwarding a report from Dr. Miller regarding her last interaction with Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on Thursday prior to his death. The report describes Epstein's mental state, requests, and planned legal meetings.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The incarcerated individual at MCC New York, subject of the mental health visit and legal case. He is described as making requests and planning to meet with attorneys.

persons.name: Dr. Miller
persons.context: The writer of the forwarded report who visited inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the SHU (Special Housing Unit) on Thursday, assessing his mental state and reporting his requests.

persons.name: Elissa Visoky
persons.context: Appears to be involved in forwarding the report from Dr. Miller regarding the interaction with Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Dr. Miller conducted a mental health visit with inmate Epstein in the SHU, assessing his condition and reporting his requests.

events.title: Last mental health visit with Epstein
events.description: Dr. Miller visited inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the SHU at MCC New York. Epstein was with a cell mate, denied suicidal thoughts, made various requests (social calls, a book), and planned to meet with his attorneys.

events.title: Email forwarding visit report
events.description: An email is sent forwarding Dr. Miller's report of her last interaction with Jeffrey Epstein prior to her departure, noting his mental state and plans.

locations: SHU (Special Housing Unit) at MCC New York
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was visited in the SHU by Dr. Miller on Thursday, August 8, 2019, just days before his death.
Epstein denied any suicidal thoughts or intentions during the visit and showed no signs of depression, anxiety, or distress.
Epstein made specific requests, including wanting social calls without a speaker phone and retrieval of a book left in the suicide watch area.
Epstein had a cell mate at the time of the visit and was planning to meet with his attorneys to work on his legal situation.
